Literature.Title: Broad spectrum antibiotic activity of the skin-PYY.
Literature.Author: Vouldoukis I, Shai Y, Nicolas P, Mor A

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of neuropeptides against a range of micro-organisms from skin, oral, respiratory and gastrointestinal tract sites.
Literature.Author: El Karim IA, Linden GJ, Orr DF, Lundy FT

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=30µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=25µg/ml),Trichophyton simii(MIC=20µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans NCTC 10449(MIC=210.9µg/ml),Lactobacillus acidophilus NCTC 1723(MIC=283.7µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=46.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=124.8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=134.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>500µg/ml),Candida albicans NCTC 3179(MIC=243.2µg/ml)
